original_text: Then they took the bones and they buried them under a tamarisk tree at Jabesh Gilead. The men did not eat any food for seven days because they were so sad.
korean_text: 그의 뼈를 가져다가 야베스 에셀 나무 아래에 장사하고 칠 일 동안 금식하였더라

sentences.original_text: and they buried them under a tamarisk tree
sentences.korean_translation: 그들을 타마리스크 나무 아래에 장사 지냈습니다

sentences.original_text: The men did not eat any food
